pr_title: Add modded biomes to overworld biome list

timeline.message: Add hook for overworld biome list

timeline.bodyText: Unfortunately, RegistryKey does not support equals.
timeline.author: maxanier

replies.bodyText: That is true but I believe you can use RegistryKey#func_244356_a to compare them which is likely to make this line a bit cleaner
replies.author: pupnewfster

replies.bodyText: That method does something weird/different. It compares the registry name/id with a registry key of a registry, I think?
replies.author: maxanier

replies.bodyText: Ah you are correct I misread which resource locations that method compares.
replies.author: pupnewfster
